title.S: Monster Scale Summit 2025 | What Separates Leaders from Laggards

description.S: Scaling technology is easy to talk about but brutally hard to get right. From CoreOS to Kubernetes, Kelsey Hightower unpacks what separates teams that scale successfully from those that struggle — not just in technology, but in leadership and execution.

title.S: Monster Scale Summit 2025 | Powering a Billion Dreams: Scaling Meesho's E-commerce Revolution

description.S: With over a billion Indians set to shop online, Meesho is redefining e-commerce. Discover how ScyllaDB plays a crucial role in handling millions of transactions, optimizing catalog ranking, and ensuring ultra-low-latency operations at Monster Scale.

speaker.S: Kiran Katreddi Kumar - VP Platform Engineering, Meesho

title.S: Monster Scale Summit 2025 | How Discord Indexes Trillions of Messages

description.S: How Discord scaled their message search infrastructure using Rust, Kubernetes, and a multi-cluster Elasticsearch architecture to achieve better performance, operability, and reliability, while enabling new search features for users.

speaker.S: Vicki Niu - Senior Software Engineer, Discord

title.S: Monster Scale Summit 2025 | Pushing Your Streaming Platform to the Limit

description.S: A hands-on session on Chaos Engineering for streaming platforms like Kafka, Pulsar, NATS, and RabbitMQ. Learn to stress test, benchmark, and fine-tune performance to ensure your system stays resilient under pressure.

title.S: Monster Scale Summit 2025 | Elad Leev Invites You to Monster Scale Summit

description.S: Elad Leev invites you to Monster Scale Summit 2025. Preview of his talk on how to push your stream platform to the limit — stress testing, benchmarking, and chaos engineering for streaming systems.

title.S: Monster Scale Summit 2025 | Spencer Ho on Mutable Big Data at Salesforce

description.S: Spencer Ho invites you to Monster Scale Summit 2025. A case study of maintaining mutable Big Data in Salesforce's activity platform pipeline — Storm topologies, Cassandra, and Elastic at scale.

title.S: Monster Scale Summit 2025 | Engineering at Scale: Keynote

description.S: Kelsey Hightower explores lessons from the early days of containers, why distributed systems are still hard, and how teams can avoid common pitfalls when chasing scale. What still excites him about engineering today.

title.S: Monster Scale Summit 2025 | Meesho: Scaling E-commerce for Bharat

description.S: Scaling for Bharat: building a tech backbone for massive traffic surges, dynamic pricing, real-time recommendations. ScyllaDB's role in millions of transactions and ultra-low-latency operations.

speaker.S: Kiran Katreddi Kumar - VP Platform Engineering, Meesho

title.S: Monster Scale Summit 2025 | Discord: Trillions of Messages Search Infrastructure

description.S: Discord's journey scaling message search from billions to trillions. Rust, Kubernetes, multi-cluster Elasticsearch — lessons learned from scaling search infrastructure.

speaker.S: Vicki Niu - Senior Software Engineer, Discord

title.S: Monster Scale Summit 2025 | Chaos Engineering for Kafka, Pulsar, NATS

description.S: Stress testing Kafka, Pulsar, NATS, and RabbitMQ. The USE method (Utilization, Saturation, Errors), OpenMessaging Benchmark, and ensuring systems stay resilient under pressure.

title.S: Monster Scale Summit 2025 | Dojo: Stream Platform Stress Testing Preview

description.S: Elad Leev from Dojo introduces his Monster Scale Summit talk on the art of stress testing systems, why we need it, and classical use cases for running those exercises.

title.S: Monster Scale Summit 2025 | Salesforce: Mutable Time Series Big Data Preview

description.S: Spencer Ho from Salesforce previews his talk on the activity platform pipeline — Storm topologies, Cassandra, Elastic, and maintaining mutable Big Data at scale.
